name: BuddyFriends!
description:
BuddyFriends!

Controls:
Move - Arrow keys
Pick up / Let go of minion - 'A'
Jump - Space

How To Play:
The minions have three possible states:

Red - Evil
Yellow - Stunned
Green - Friendly :)

The goal is to make every minion Friendly.
How do you make a minion Friendly?
1. Get a Friendly minion to touch an Evil minion. This stuns the Evil minion.
2. Pick the Evil minion up. Hurry! You only have a couple seconds until they wake up.
3. Let it go.

Sounds easy? Think again:
If two Friendly minions bump into eachother they will both get stunned, and if you don't pick them up in time they will both turn evil.
If you don't watch out, things can quickly go Out Of Control!
